title: A Desperate Dive Into the Grab Bag
description:
Look, we were gonna do Arkham Knights this week, but realized nobody wanted to hear an hour long dunkfest - join us as we pivot to talking about a bunch of good games, instead! With just a liiiiittle dunking for good measure.

Games discussed: Case of the Golden Idol, EverCrawl, Binding of Isaac, I Was A Teenage Exocolonist, Deadeye Deepfake Simulacrum, No Man's Sky
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Chris Plante, Justin McElroy, Russ Frushtick)
